attributes.additional_details:
We trust our bank details over the phone.

We trust our innermost conversations over the phone.

Surely we can trust our vote over the phone.

This petition proposes a telephone voting system - it’s friendlier to the environment, it’s much more convenient to the voter and it cuts down on the need for polling officials.

Following the 30% turnout in Council Elections across the country something must be done to encourage people to engage with our political system.
